divs: Sighting DetailsOk, this is now the 2nd time i've seen something like this in the past 2 weeks and its always late late in AM like 2-4am. Thers a blinking object way way high up in the sky. I see no outline of this thing. Its just a light that blinks about every 15 seconds or so and it dosen't move. I watched this flash in the same part of the sky to the right of the moon here theres 2 pretty bright starts directly to the right of those stars this thing flashed for a good 30 minutes before it was gone. It was in the same exact part of the sky. I don't go out that often this time of night but i've managed to see this twice now in 2 weeks. NOT a satellite NOT a plane. Unless its the really really slow kind.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
